author: jefft
msg: Use the FORREST_HOME env variable if forrest.home isn't set.

author: jefft
msg: Don't set the project.home variable, so that the 'forrest' command can be
reused for running forrestbot scripts.  The forrest.build.xml script sets
project.home to ${basedir}, so this shouldn't have any effect

author: jefft
msg: Update to the official Ant 1.6 beta, needed for the new forrestbot
